tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Timelapse: 2012 Democratic National Convention Hall Build
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Watch as the Time Warner Cable Arena in Charlotte, North Carolina, transforms from a sports venue into a world-class convention hall. The arena will host the 2012 Democratic National Convention from September 4-6 in Charlotte, North Carolina.

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: "AND I'M AN﻿ AUSTRALIAN!" ** That figures.

here's another fool brainwashed by retardicans into voting against his own intrests. sad the way the retardicans﻿ can suff emptyheaded fools full of lies & the stupid bastards think they've got the real story. SHIT DUMNEY IS A 2 FACED TAX CHEAT ! flip flopping makes him 2 faced & hiding money offshore & his tax returns full of loophole & tax code devises so rich people don't pay makes him a cheat. if he loved America why wouldn't he put his money in American accounts & pay his share of taxes?
hy·poc·ri·sy [hi-pok-ruh-see] 1. The liberal thinking behind photo ID being required at the Democratic National Convention, but not at a voting booth to choose the leader of the﻿ free world.
I love politics and the presidential﻿ election, this is better than any big fight or Super-bowel. Can't wait to see the Convention.
Look Obama will win, we are making sure it will happened. The﻿ win has already been planned. So stop fighting.
What is the name of this﻿ beat?
Yes, they don't trust all﻿ the extremist shooters the right wing has. There has been no threat like this to the voting booths.
It seems they are using a much smaller﻿ stadium than the RNC.
And now﻿ Suzanne Barr has been forced to resign due to a discrimination lawsuit against Janet Napolitano, another bombshell to spoil the Democrat's convention. What more is out there?
What I love about Obama and the Democratic Party in general is just how they are able to be positive and﻿ uplifting and actually think forward, not backwards.

Extremist shooter? With every shooter the lib media has tried to label as being a tea party / conservative motivated, they have been wrong. The shooter just last month in DC was in﻿ fact an active liberal LGBT supporter. And there were several bomb threats made on Chic fil A by liberals after their boycott plan backfired. Tell me more about your extremist shooters.
The Feds have dropped their suit against Sheriff Arpaio right before the convention. Oh, dear, oh, dear, how is﻿ this going to look?!
just keep believing the﻿ shit retardicans stuff into your pointy zipperhead. you've got another 2 months of blissful ignorance before your fantasy world pops like a homeloan bubble.
Nah, I'd prefer they leave the fairy﻿ tales at home altogether.

Romney / Ryan 2012 !!!!! By a landslide margin. * All those laying on their backs and collecting checks from the government will have to go get a job ! .......... The great news is " There will be jobs waiting for you !! * Romney-Ryan﻿ 2012 *
I wonder if all of the attendees﻿ will be wearing their pink vagina suits?
It planned huh. I guess Oblamer is planning to smuggle all of mexico across the border with promises of our jobs and﻿ a drivers liscense if they vote for him?
Can't watch! Wednesday is football night!﻿
It's been planned? How﻿ do you know?
how about the way retardicans kicked out the legal delegates they didn't like &﻿ hijack the RNC from the republican party?
Because they have﻿ no funds!!!!

"What I﻿ love about Obama and the Democratic﻿ Party in general is just how they are able to be positive and uplifting and actually think forward, not backwards."
COFFEE SPEW!
One week every 4 years I am stuck watching the "Kardashians".... This is that week! I'd hear less lies watching that then the﻿ Democrat National Convention!
